title: Elemental lux bug????
body:
So as cool looking as elemental lux is as a skin, i want to say and am 90% positive there is a bug with the elemental lux skin that players are starting to exploit. 

So to the bug, from my last game playing against elemental lux an elemental lux, feeling pretty good being fed as an adc since im terrible at the role, i get one shot from way out of range off from lux not even on the screen for me to see, and it was only the snare that got me. i thought i was unlucky and got caught from an unwarded area.

5min go but and lux shows herself again this time on my screen and hits a snare that was fired slightly to the left of middle, in which i dodgd it free and clear, but yet being on the right of the lane still got snared and immediatly ulted which was fired the same direction of the lane the snare went so i would have missed me as well, but i got one shot there.

now i know i shouldnt "cry wolf" because lux is really strong in this current meta, but just from players using the elemental skin for lux it seems the range and hit boxes of all abilites and basics are double that of the other skins.


if possible would someone check this out and let me know if i was right about the skin causing a bug with lux's range of attacks?

please and thank you

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We answered this a bit in our [Ask Riot Post](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/12/ask-riot-leagues-future-and-luxs-q/), but we are prioritizing the visual issues with her (Q), and working to resolve a few of the other clarity issues that have been reported.
I have heard that there have been some bugs going on with that skin.
